subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When Dale Earnhardt Jr. climbed out of his wrecked No. 8 Chevrolet and jumped into the No. 5 of Kyle Busch to race the final laps last weekend, he turned heads and raised eyebrows.
snippet: When Dale Earnhardt Jr. climbed out of his wrecked No. 8 Chevrolet and jumped into the No. 5 of Kyle Busch to race the final laps last weekend, he turned heads and raised eyebrows.
